review_text:
Homely Food 

Wow Ate their coconut rice,Chinese rice,Efo-riro, it's rich & delicious and their are wide variety to select from
There foods are very homely and delicious,I love it so much. There africana dishes taste nice and sweet.

It’s a nice place to eat good food with homely tastes. They’v have quite numbers of African dishes and these are what distinguished 777 from other fast-food in the locality. The hygiene is excellent, well behaved staff with good customer services. Conducive environment

review_title: A fast-food restaurant with a difference .
review_text: Excellent hygiene, good foods with homely tastes . Very conducive environment. Good customer services, good music and very accessible.
